00020 #include "calvin_files/writers/test/GenericFileUpdaterTest.h"

00023 using namespace std;
00024 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00025 
00026 #define TEST_FILE_NAME "../data/small_cel_file"
00027 
00028 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( GenericFileUpdaterTest );
00029 
00030 void GenericFileUpdaterTest::setUp() {}
00031 
00032 void GenericFileUpdaterTest::tearDown() {}

00034 void GenericFileUpdaterTest::testCreation()
00035 {
00036

00038 
00039 void GenericFileUpdaterTest::UpdaterTest()
00040 {
00041         string tempFile = TEST_FILE_NAME;
00042         tempFile.append(".TMP");
00043         if(Copy(TEST_FILE_NAME, tempFile))
00044         {
00045                 GenericFileUpdater* updater = new GenericFileUpdater(tempFile);
00046                 DataSetHeader dataSetHdr;
00047                 dataSetHdr.SetName(L"Test");
00048                 dataSetHdr.SetRowCnt(1);
00049                 dataSetHdr.AddAsciiColumn(L"Test", 32);
00050                 DataSetWriter* writer = updater->GetUpdateDataSetWriter(dataSetHdr);
00051                 writer->WriteHeader();
00052                 writer->Write("Hello World", 32);
00053 
00054                 writer->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00055                 delete writer;
00056                 delete updater;
00057 
00058                 GenericData gData;
00059                 GenericFileReader reader;
00060                 reader.SetFilename(tempFile);
00061                 reader.ReadHeader(gData);
00062                 gData.Close();
00063                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSetCnt() == 6);
00064                 std::wstring name = gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetName();
00065                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(name.compare(L"Test") == 0);
00066         }
00067         remove(tempFile.c_str());
00068 }
00069 
00070 void GenericFileUpdaterTest::Updater2Test()
00071 {
00072         // Update by adding a DataSetHeader that has zero rows and cols and has items in the parameter list.
00073         string tempFile = TEST_FILE_NAME;
00074         tempFile.append("2.TMP");
00075         if(Copy(TEST_FILE_NAME, tempFile))
00076         {
00077                 DataSetHeader dataSetHdr;
00078                 ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00079                 nvt.SetName(L"First");
00080                 nvt.SetValueInt32(11);
00081                 dataSetHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00082                 nvt.SetName(L"Deuxieme");
00083                 nvt.SetValueFloat(5.75f);
00084                 dataSetHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00085                 dataSetHdr.SetName(L"Test2");
00086                 dataSetHdr.SetRowCnt(0);
00087                 GenericFileUpdater* updater = new GenericFileUpdater(tempFile);
00088                 DataSetWriter* writer = updater->GetUpdateDataSetWriter(dataSetHdr);
00089                 writer->WriteHeader();
00090 
00091                 writer->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00092                 delete writer;
00093                 delete updater;
00094 
00095                 GenericData gData;
00096                 GenericFileReader reader;
00097                 reader.SetFilename(tempFile);
00098                 reader.ReadHeader(gData);
00099                 gData.Close();
00100                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSetCnt() == 6);
00101                 std::wstring name = gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetName();
00102                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(name.compare(L"Test2") == 0);
00103                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetRowCnt() == 0);
00104                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetColumnCnt() == 0);
00105                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetNameValParamCnt() == 2);
00106                 
00107                 ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt begin, end;
00108                 gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00109                 ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt ii = begin;
00110                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetName() == L"First");
00111                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetValueInt32() == 11);
00112                 ++ii;
00113                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetName() == L"Deuxieme");
00114                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetValueFloat() == 5.75f);
00115         }
00116         // dont' delete the file because it is used in the next test.
00117 }
00118 
00119 void GenericFileUpdaterTest::UpdateExistingDataSet1Test()
00120 {
00121         // Update an existing data set at the end of the file
00122         string tempFile = TEST_FILE_NAME;
00123         tempFile.append("2.TMP");
00124 
00125         DataSetHeader dataSetHdr;
00126         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00127         nvt.SetName(L"Happy Day");
00128         nvt.SetValueAscii("fun in the sun");
00129         dataSetHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00130         dataSetHdr.SetName(L"Test2");
00131         dataSetHdr.SetRowCnt(0);
00132         GenericFileUpdater* updater = new GenericFileUpdater(tempFile);
00133         DataSetWriter* writer = updater->GetUpdateDataSetWriter(dataSetHdr);
00134         writer->WriteHeader();
00135 
00136         writer->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00137         delete writer;
00138         delete updater;
00139 
00140         GenericData gData;
00141         GenericFileReader reader;
00142         reader.SetFilename(tempFile);
00143         reader.ReadHeader(gData);
00144         gData.Close();
00145         int32_t dataSetCnt = gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSetCnt();
00146         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataSetCnt == 6);
00147         std::wstring name = gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetName();
00148         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(name.compare(L"Test2") == 0);
00149         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetRowCnt() == 0);
00150         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetColumnCnt() == 0);
00151         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetNameValParamCnt() == 1);
00152         
00153         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt begin, end;
00154         gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00155         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt ii = begin;
00156         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetName() == L"Happy Day");
00157         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetValueAscii() == "fun in the sun");
00158 
00159         // uncomment this line when the updater is working
00160         remove(tempFile.c_str());
00161 }
00162 
00163 void GenericFileUpdaterTest::UpdateExistingDataSet2Test()
00164 {
00165         // Update an existing data set that is not at the end of the file
00166         string tempFile = TEST_FILE_NAME;
00167         tempFile.append("4.TMP");
00168         if(Copy(TEST_FILE_NAME, tempFile))
00169         {
00170                 DataSetHeader dataSetHdr;
00171                 ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00172                 nvt.SetName(L"First");
00173                 nvt.SetValueInt32(11);
00174                 dataSetHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00175                 nvt.SetName(L"Deuxieme");
00176                 nvt.SetValueFloat(5.75f);
00177                 dataSetHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00178                 dataSetHdr.SetName(L"Intensity");
00179                 dataSetHdr.SetRowCnt(0);
00180                 GenericFileUpdater* updater = new GenericFileUpdater(tempFile);
00181                 DataSetWriter* writer = updater->GetUpdateDataSetWriter(dataSetHdr);
00182                 writer->WriteHeader();
00183 
00184                 writer->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00185                 delete writer;
00186                 delete updater;
00187 
00188                 GenericData gData;
00189                 GenericFileReader reader;
00190                 reader.SetFilename(tempFile);
00191                 reader.ReadHeader(gData);
00192                 gData.Close();
00193                 int32_t dataSetCnt = gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSetCnt();
00194                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataSetCnt == 6);
00195                 std::wstring name = gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetName();
00196                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(name.compare(L"Intensity") == 0);
00197                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetRowCnt() == 0);
00198                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetColumnCnt() == 0);
00199                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetNameValParamCnt() == 2);
00200                 
00201                 ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt begin, end;
00202                 gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00203                 ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt ii = begin;
00204                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetName() == L"First");
00205                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetValueInt32() == 11);
00206                 ++ii;
00207                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetName() == L"Deuxieme");
00208                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetValueFloat() == 5.75f);
00209         }
00210         // uncomment this line when the updater is working
00211         remove(tempFile.c_str());
00212 }
00213 
00214 bool GenericFileUpdaterTest::Copy(std::string filename, std::string copyFilename)
00215 {
00216         ifstream in(filename.c_str(), ios::in | ios::binary);
00217         ofstream out(copyFilename.c_str(), ios::out | ios::binary);
00218         if(in.is_open() && out.is_open())
00219         {
00220                 char* buf = new char[1];
00221                 while(!in.eof())
00222                 {
00223                         in.read(buf, 1);
00224                         out.write(buf, 1);
00225                 }
00226                 delete[] buf;
00227                 in.close();
00228                 out.close();
00229                 return true;
00230         }
00231         return false;
00232 }
